short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse websites with CXone Guide automatically loaded. This feature can be toggled on and off.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The CXone Guide plugin enables you to showcase Guide on any website without requiring script tags being added to that site. Just install it to your Chrome browser, build your rules in your Guide tenant, and BINGO! Guide runs on the customer site.
